name: notion-links-db-manager
description: TypeScript application to manage Notion bookmarks database with AI-powered features

scripts.log:info: echo 'INFO' > .loglevel && echo 'Log level set to INFO (verbose)'
scripts.log:error: echo 'ERROR' > .loglevel && echo 'Log level set to ERROR (clean)'
scripts.log:debug: echo 'DEBUG' > .loglevel && echo 'Log level set to DEBUG (very verbose)'
scripts.log:clean: rm -f .loglevel && echo 'Log level reset to default (clean)'
scripts.log:status: test -f .loglevel && echo "Log level: $(cat .loglevel)" || echo 'Log level: ERROR (default)'
